dcterms:creator: I. K. Baldry
et al.
dcterms:description: The GAMA survey is a spectroscopic and multiwavelength photometric survey aimed at studying cosmic structures on a scale of 1 kpc to 1 Mpc, consisting of over 150,000 spectra of objects with reliable heliocentric redshifts.
dcterms:title: Galaxy And Mass Assembly (GAMA) survey

dcterms:creator: M. R. Blanton
et al.
dcterms:description: The Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS) provides a comprehensive dataset of galaxy spectra, which has been utilized for various astronomical studies, including outlier detection.
dcterms:title: Sloan Digital Sky Survey (SDSS)

dcterms:creator: M. Colless
et al.
dcterms:description: The 2dF Galaxy Redshift Survey provides a dataset of galaxy redshifts and spectra, which has been instrumental in studying galaxy formation and evolution.
dcterms:title: 2dF Galaxy Redshift Survey

dcterms:creator: W. Zhang
M. Zhu
K. G. Derpanis
dcterms:description: The Penn Action Dataset is a large dataset containing video clips with detailed action annotations, used for action recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Jhuang
J. Gall
S. ZufÔ¨Å
C. Schmid
M. J. Black
dcterms:description: The sub-JHMDB Dataset is a subset of the JHMDB dataset, focusing on action recognition in videos, providing a collection of annotated video clips.
dcterms:title: sub-JHMDB Dataset
